document_data.name: Plant grower
document_data.creator: [[Hedge wizard]]s
document_data.mainbody: '''Plant grower''' was an [[alchemical]] concoction which made plants grow bigger.
document_data.Powers: If applied to the roots of a plant throughout its growth cycle, the vegetable would become up to twice as large.{{Cite dragon/163/Hedge Wizards|21}}
document_data.History: The synthesis of this reagent was extremely delicate, requiring both chemical and herbal knowledge in order to brew correctly.{{Cite dragon/163/Hedge Wizards|24}} [[Hedge wizard]]s often traded in it, making multiple gallons in a single batch.
